hints.content:
We can add the number of  balloon animals Coco  $\green{\text{gave away}}$ and the number of  balloon animals that were $\pink{\text{left}}$ to find the number Coco made.

$\green{79} + \pink{19} = \purple{\Box}$

question.content:
Coco the clown made balloon animals and gave $79$ of them away.  At the end of the day, Coco had $19$ balloon animals left.  

**How many balloon animals did Coco make?**    

[[☃ input-number 1]] balloon animals
